q1: Hello! When was FC Porto founded?
a1: Hi! What do you think about FIFA World cup results?
q2: It's been an exciting World Cup full of shocks so far!
a2: Wikipedia shows FC Porto being founded on                 28 September 1893.

a4: I'm going to have to go with James Rodriguez.
